SingleCell.description: Data about a physical sample consisting of a single cell or nucleus taken from an organism (living or deceased) or derived from such a Sample.

rdfs:label.description: A human-readable name for the entity.

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the JSON Schema that defines this object.

TerraCore:hasAnatomicalRegion.title: hasAnatomicalRegion
TerraCore:hasAnatomicalRegion.comment: Many groups are convening to define Common Coordinate Frameworks for specific organs/species.  This will be a rapidly evolving area in the near future.  Thus allowing text or URI as we wait for the field to mature allows us to support what we hope will at a minimum be controlled vocabulary under discussion of these groups.
TerraCore:hasAnatomicalRegion.description: A reference to the physical location within the AnatomicalSite from which the BioSample was taken.

TerraCore:hasCellCycle.title: hasCellCycle
TerraCore:hasCellCycle.description: A property that describes the stage of the cell cycle at the time the sample was obtained.

TerraCore:hasGeneExpressionProgram.title: hasGeneExpressionProgram
TerraCore:hasGeneExpressionProgram.description: A property that characterizes the gene expression patterns at work in the cell.

TerraCore:hasCellState.title: hasCellState
TerraCore:hasCellState.description: A property that describes the cell’s metabolic or electrophysiological state.

SingleCell.title: SingleCell

Library.description: A collection of nucleic acid molecules.

rdfs:label.description: A human-readable name for the entity.

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the JSON Schema that defines this object.

Library.title: Library
